corvega.name: Corvega
corvega.description: An abandoned automobile factory that has been converted into a makeshift settlement for one of the biggest raider gangs in the Commonwealth.

goodneighbor.name: Goodneighbor
goodneighbor.description: A lawless settlement known for its tolerance of all kinds of people, including criminals and outcasts.

red-rocket.name: Red Rocket
red-rocket.description: A gas station and service center that has been repurposed as a settlement hub for survivors.

vault-99.name: Vault 99
vault-99.description: Vault 99 was designed to study various social experiments on its inhabitants, while taking full neural scans of their brains once per week.
